derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: via late Latin from Greek nuktalōps, from nux, nukt- 'night' + alaos 'blind' + ōps 'eye'

means.word_mean: 1. inability to see clearly in dim light; due to a deficiency of vitamin A or to a retinal disorder
